question: Where is the headquarters of International Press Institute (IPI)?
explanation: On the occasion of World Press Freedom Day (WPFD-2019), Vienna-based International Press Institute (IPI) said in its latest report that as many as 55 journalists have been killed since May 2018. Press freedom globally is under intense and growing pressure, as illiberal-minded governments seek to shut down critical voices and, in many cases, deliberately erode the credibility of independent media.  According to a global network of journalists, Governments across the world are increasingly clamping down on press freedom as new laws are being enacted to curtail media independence.  around the world. While on the one hand governments are attempting to curtail press freedom, on the other journalists around the world are being killed with impunity.
